product_name: The North Face Denali Fleece Jacket - Men's Extended Size
long_description: The North Face Denali men's extended-size fleece jacket is a comfortable, all-around fleece for snowy climates. Wear it as a mid layer or outer layer, depending on the day. Polartec(R) 300 Series fleece (87% recycled content in the solid colors and 65% in the heathered) is warm, lightweight and compressible. Abrasion-resistant, laundered 2-ply nylon (also recycled) on upper body and elbows provides reinforcement and durability. Durable Water Repellent finish fends off light rain showers and snow. Elastic-bound cuffs and hem drawcord. Features zippered hand pockets and both Napoleon and horizontal chest pockets. Standard fit provides easy layering. Wear The North Face Denali fleece jacket on its own or zipped into complementing parkas from The North Face.
short_description: The North Face Denali men's extended-size fleece jacket is a comfortable, all-around fleece for snowy climates. Wear it as a mid layer or outer layer, depending on the day.
